channel.description: Recent content in Wallpapers on PowerShell Magazine | For the most powerful community

item.title: Windows 8 PowerShell Lock Screen
item.description: This week I was busy preparing a PowerShell workshop I’m delivering next week and this is my first workshop on my new laptop with Windows 8 RTM installed on it.

item.title: PowerShell Wallpapers
item.description: Some PowerShell wallpapers I created over the years to decorate my desktop and wanted to share them with you. If you have some of your own that you want to share with the community, send them over and we’ll add them to this page.
